text: VDURA (founded in 2024) is an AI data storage provider, located at San Jose, California, United States. == History == Garth Gibson and Hugo Patterson co- founded VDURAand Ken Claffey is the CEO of VDURA. Vdura is an aspect of a hardware ecosystem that enables customization to meet AI and HPC necessitate in an array of applications. VDURA, used in on-premises, public cloud, and hybrid environments, is at the forefront of AI and HPC data storage and management. VDURA and Jeskell Systems partnered in 2024. VDURA introduced the Velocity Partner Program. == References == Category:American technology companies Category:2024 establishments in the United States
title: VDURA
